mapper.insert: insert into sbmember( m_no, m_email , m_pw , m_name , m_nick , m_address , m_phone ) values( sbmember_seq.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{addr}, #{phone} )
insert into member1(m_id, m_password, m_nick ) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{nick})
mapper.select: select U_NO as no, U_ID as id, U_PW as pw, U_NAME as name, U_NICK as nick, U_BIRTH as birth, U_GENDER as gender, U_STATE as state, U_JOINDATE as joindate, U_LOGINDATE as logindate, U_CHECK as check1, U_PHOTO as photo from member
select m_id as id, m_nick as nick from member1 where m_nick='준호'
SELECT M_ID AS ID, M_PASSWORD AS PW, M_NICK AS NICK FROM MEMBER1 WHERE M_ID = #{id} AND M_PASSWORD = #{pw}
SELECT M_email AS email, M_PASSWORD AS PW, M_NICK AS NICK FROM SBMEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL = #{email} AND M_PASSWORD = #{pw}
